document_title: Knee joint space stenosis: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: hep-khe-khop-goi.json_2_Signs of narrowing of the knee joint space
subsection_content:
Knee joint stenosis can be easily recognized through a number of clear symptoms as follows: (2)
Joint pain: The pain appears dull, gradually increases when moving or changing positions and tends to decrease with adequate rest.; Limited mobility: Joint space narrowing occurs due to sloughing of joint cartilage, increasing friction between bone ends, leading to limited mobility, especially when going up and down stairs or sitting. squat or change position suddenly; Deformed knee joint: The knee joint can be deformed due to narrowing of the joint space and bone spurs.; Joints are stiff in the morning, unable to move and this symptom usually disappears within 30 minutes.; Strange sounds appear when moving the knee joint.; Large knee joint spurs appear easily.; Muscles around the knee joint show signs of atrophy due to limited movement.
subsection_title: hep khe khop goi.json. Signs of narrowing of the knee joint space
subsection_data:
